gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਗੁਰ ਪੂਰਨ ਸਰਬਮੲੀ ਪੂਰਨ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾ ਕੈ ਪਰਪੂਰਨ ਕੈ ਜਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Pooran Braham Gur Pooran Sarabamaee , Pooran Kripaa Kai Parapooran Kai Jaaneeai ?
translation: Guru-blessed Sikh realises the universal presence of God through the total benefaction and kindness of the complete Guru who is manifestation of Supreme God.

gurmukhi: ਦਰਸ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਲਿਵ ੲੇਕ ਅੳੁ ਅਨੇਕ ਮੇਕ ਸਬਦ ਬਿਬੇਕ ਟੇਕ ੲੇਕੈ ੳੁਰ ਅਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Daras Dhiaan Liv Ayk Au Anayk Mayka , Sabad Bibayk Tayk Aykai Ur Aaneeai ?
translation: By absorbing the mind in the form of True Guru and contemplation of Guru's teachings, the Sikh lodges that God in his heart who is one and is present in all.

gurmukhi: ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਦਰਸ ਅਰੁ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਪੇਖਤਾ ਬਕਤਾ ਸ੍ਰੋਤਾ ੲੇਕੈ ਪਹਿਚਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Drisati Daras Aru Sabad Surati Mili , Paykhataa Bakataa Srotaa Aykai Pahichaaneeai ?
translation: By keeping the vision of the eyes in the glimpse of Satguru and tuning the ears to the sound of Guru's utterances, an obedient and devoted Sikh reckons Him as the speaker, listener and watcher.

gurmukhi: ਸੂਖਮ ਸਥੂਲ ਮੂਲ ਗੁਪਤ ਪ੍ਰਗਟ ਠਟ ਨਟ ਵਟ ਸਿਮਰਨ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਮਨੁ ਮਾਨੀਅੈ ॥੯੯॥
transliteration: Sookham Sadool Mool Goupat Pragat Tthata , Nat Vat Simaran Mantr Manu Maaneeai ?99?
translation: God who is the cause of the visible and invisible expanse, who is playing the game of the world both as a performer and the apparatus, the mind of a devoted Sikh of Guru gets engrossed in words and teachings of the Guru. (99)
